document_data.name: Elastul Raurym
document_data.mainbody: '''Elastul Raurym''' was the [[marchion]] of [[Mirabar]]. The [[Hammers]] were his personal bodyguard.<ref name="VoloN-p153" >
document_data.Appearance: Elastul was fat, and had a red beard.
document_data.Personality: Elastul was often devising devious plots, but these were rarely put into practice. He was also known to be quite lustful with a love of money and decadent pleasures. Marchion Raurym made a point of traveling south to warmer climes before the onset of winter, to negotiate trade agreements with rulers who had many luxuries, but little metal.<ref name="VoloN-p153" >
